com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneManager

  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class manages the creation and destruction of Scene objects. These objects should always be created via the SceneManager.
    Author:
    Sascha
